name: Ephemeral (Billy Dent)
description:
(Press Escape to pause, i forgot to add info about this in-game!)

A short game about catching bugs, picking flowers and transitioning to the afterlife.

I'm really not a religious person, but I guess I channeled what I would hope god is like, if they exist. 

My ideas of mood drove the writing more than any concrete goals, and I think the story and connection to the jam theme was pretty weak as a result. I'm happy with how it plays and looks though.

Made for the 1Bit Jam in June 2020, with the theme of death
